ygData.subject: RE: Re: Root
ygData.msgSnippet: Its the beauty of playing a Wizard. No Root, No Pet, No chance to Solo. Aljernon 29th Level Wizard ... From: nikkisixx@mindspring.com
ygData.messageBody:
Its the beauty of playing a Wizard.

No Root, No Pet, No chance to Solo.

Aljernon
29th Level Wizard

-----Original Message-----
From: nikkisixx@... [mailto:nikkisixx@...]
Sent: Thursday, September 30, 1999 1:25 PM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Root


From: nikkisixx@...

Just turned 29 and was so looking forward to using Bonds of Force spell
to "kite" mobs (well, blast and run anyway), but I am getting a lot of
resists with blue griffenes,and when it is not resisted it only seems to
hold few seconds, unlike druids or rangers low level snare spell which
lasts a long time. Can anyone else with more experience with this spell
give any advice? Thanks.

Greg (Kronan on Innoruuk)
